summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. It includes out-count forms and an inmate roster noting several inmates on suicide watch, providing administrative records from the facility around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, showing total inmate population and specific unit counts.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document shows prison administrative records from Metropolitan Correctional Center New York dated August 10, 2019.
Inmate roster indicates multiple inmates (registration numbers 0001-0004) were on suicide watch or had suicide-related assignments.
Total inmate count shows 758 total with 4 out-counted, leaving 754 in facility.
Multiple housing units (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B) are listed with their respective inmate counts.
Forms are official Bureau of Prisons documents used for inmate tracking and count verification procedures.
